Name: LOCOSOCCER
About the game: Welcome to the ultimate physics-based football game! Up to 10 players in the same match Select multiple players in the pitch or only select your own Customize your player/s Play with friends or against friends Play on a LAN match like the old days! Invite your friends over Steam or join any Steam match available on the world Master the Locoso's Spinning to become better at shooting and goalkeeping
